name: Maliya
description:
Hidden from the world, the card and strategy game: Maliya™ delivers fun for centuries to those who know it, First time that is developed for video game consoles and gives you different options to keep you amused.

Have fun is simple but interesting: Play against the computer with 6 different difficulty levels.

More depth? Visit the story and helps the hero to win the Maliya™ tournament in a different world, discovers the three different endings that has this story.

But what is a strategy or cards game if you cannot challenge another human, Yes! We did it for you! With the 'Malilla del campo' mode you can play against another player without another console, just 1 game, 1 console ... 2 PLAYERS! Really Great!!!

What are you expecting for? Every minute counts, enjoy and have fun with this new game.


Gameplay
-Play the story mode with 3 different endings
-Play a fast game versus CPU with 6 different difficult level
Or
-Play versus a FRIEND IN THE SAME CONSOLE… Yes!! 2 players in one console!!!

1-2 player(s)
10485KB Minimum
Touchscreen

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One time license fee entitles play on up to 3 PlayStation® Vita systems activated by this account.
